features.name: Dashboard Page
features.description: Main dashboard showing KPI cards (Companies, Users, Assets, Audit Logs counts), recent companies list, and recent assets list. Fetches data from API on load.

features.name: Companies Page
features.description: Lists all companies with status badges. Allows creating new companies via modal form. Shows company cards with name, description, and status.

features.name: Company Detail Page
features.description: Shows detailed view of a single company including its users with access and assets. Allows editing company details and managing user access.

features.name: Users Page
features.description: Lists all users with their email, name, status, and primary company. Allows creating new users via modal form.

features.name: Assets Page
features.description: Lists all assets with type, identifier, status, and assigned company. Allows creating new assets via modal form with company selection.

features.name: Audit Logs Page
features.description: Displays audit logs filtered by company. Requires selecting a company first. Shows entity type, action, timestamp, and changes.

features.name: Settings Page
features.description: Application settings page with theme toggle (light/dark mode) and other configuration options.

features.name: Layout Components
features.description: Main layout wrapper with sidebar navigation and top navigation bar. Sidebar shows navigation links to all pages.

features.name: UI Components Library
features.description: Reusable UI components including Button, Card, Badge, Input, Select, Modal, Table, Loading spinner, and EmptyState.

features.name: API Service Layer
features.description: Centralized API functions for all backend communication. Includes functions for companies, users, assets, company access, and audit logs CRUD operations.

features.name: Auth Context
features.description: React context for authentication state management (placeholder for future auth implementation).

features.name: Theme Context
features.description: React context for theme management (light/dark mode toggle).

features.name: Type Definitions
features.description: TypeScript interfaces for all data models: Company, User, Asset, AuditLog, CompanyAccess, and API request/response types.

features.name: App Router
features.description: Main application routing configuration using React Router. Defines routes for Dashboard, Companies, Users, Assets, Audit Logs, and Settings.

test_guidance.navigation: Use sidebar links to navigate between pages. Sidebar is always visible on the left.
test_guidance.forms: Modal forms are used for creating new entities. Click 'Add' or 'Create' buttons to open modals.
test_guidance.api_dependency: Frontend connects to backend API. Ensure backend is running for full functionality tests.
